QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: httpUrl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: HTTP url address and port to communicate with the data collection script. Example: 0.0.0.0:5000

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: webSocketUrl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: WebSocket url address and port to communicate with the data collection script. Example: ws://0.0.0.0:5001
